description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Big title update for Ninja Exorcist, makes the ambitious action-adventure stealth game from Nebula Game Studios, with hours of metroidvania type exploration in 19 big stages, an awesome RPG-like upgrade tree and character leveling better than ever.  Updates include stealth training mode, Scythe weapon, and tons of bug fixes including stealth and combat refinement. See in-game for details.
